title: How do I report someone out of game?
body:
How do I report someone out of game? They offered boosting and sent me a link that wanted me to pay real money. 

I can't seem to find anywhere to report them

replies.body: Reach out to us by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can review the situation.  Be sure to include any details you can including the summoner name.  Thanks for helping us keep the community safe!

I'm sorry Porocles. The link you sent me is very out of date and does not have a general subject that relates to my issue or at least not an easily navigational way to fine the aproperiet category. Do you have an suggestions on the link as to what to categorize my problem as?
